requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel or AMD Dual Core @ 2.8 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.2 Compatible Graphics Card
  • Storage: 30 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Standard audio
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel or AMD Dual Core @ 2.8 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 1010 or equivalent
  • Storage: 30 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Standard audio
